name: allio-pro
description: Premium media downloader for all social media platforms

scripts.build: node -e "require('fs').mkdirSync('public', { recursive: true }); require('fs').copyFileSync('index.html', 'public/index.html'); require('fs').copyFileSync('style.css', 'public/style.css'); require('fs').copyFileSync('script.js', 'public/script.js'); require('fs').copyFileSync('manifest.json', 'public/manifest.json'); require('fs').copyFileSync('sw.js', 'public/sw.js');"

author: LoopLabs Tech
